actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Education Reconciliation Act of 1981 to prevent the ratable reduction of payments with respect to entitlements established under section 2 of Public Law 874 (Eighty-first Congress).

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Education Reconciliation Act of 1981 to repeal provisions of such Act which: (1) provide for the ratable reduction of specified Federal impact aid payments to local educational agencies; and (2) prohibit making specified types of Federal impact aid payments based on certain entitlements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Education Reconciliation Act of 1981 to prevent the ratable reduction of payments with respect to entitlements established under section 2 of Public Law 874 (Eighty-first Congress).
